short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Applying to jobs has never been easier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is designed to enhance your job search experience by streamlining the application process. It seamlessly integrates with our web app to help you efficiently submit your job applications with ease and convenience.
